{"id":984938743,"question_id":2866,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"11 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1688351521,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"7 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/984938743/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Even Odd Subarray With Threshold","memory":"43.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int longestAlternatingSubarray(int[] nums, int threshold) {\n        int len = nums.length;\n        \n        int max =0;\n        \n        int st=0;\n        \n        \n        while(st<len && (nums[st]%2==1 || nums[st]>threshold))\n            st++;\n        \n        for(int ed=st; ed<len; ed++){\n            \n            if(nums[ed]>threshold || (ed-st>0 && (nums[ed-1]+nums[ed])%2==0)){\n                st=ed;\n                while(st<len && (nums[st]%2==1 || nums[st]>threshold))\n                    st++;\n                  \n                ed=st-1;\n                continue;\n            }\n            \n            \n            \n            max = Math.max(max, ed-st+1);\n            \n        \n        \n        \n        }\n        \n        return max;\n        \n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-even-odd-subarray-with-threshold","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
